detaileddescription.para: function that handles key up being presessed
function that handles key down being presessed
function that handles tab being presessed

This function is called repeatedly by the readline library to build a list of possible completions. It returns one match per function call. Once there are no more completions available, it returns NULL.
function that runs a command for terminal or script
Text-based UI functionality. These functions are primarily concerned with interacting with the readline library.
